title: Concepts
description: Schema for extracted concepts and terminology from documentation with NLP analysis

metadata.description: Metadata about the concept extraction process

totalConcepts.description: Total number of unique concepts extracted

extractionDate.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when concepts were extracted

topConcepts.description: List of top concepts ranked by importance and frequency

items.description: A single concept with its metrics and relationships

fileCount.description: Number of distinct files containing this concept

type.description: Concept type: domain (domain-specific), technical (general technical), general (common term)

category.description: Concept category for grouping related terms

tfidf.description: TF-IDF score indicating term importance (higher = more distinctive)

coOccurs.description: List of concepts that frequently appear alongside this concept
